articles.title: 'Basketball is different where we’re from': New KD doc examines PG County hoops - The Athletic
articles.description: Prince George's County has long been an area of upward mobility. But it's also been a hoops hotbed. Showtime brings this world to life.

articles.description: The ATP has extended the suspension of the ATP Tour through to July 31, 2020 due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
